## Session 3 - Basics of Species Distribution Models (SDMs)

Species distribution models are instrumental in predicting and understanding the geographic ranges of species. In this session, we will delve into the use of dismo, SDMtune and sdmpredictors R packages, covering the basics of species distribution modelling. Participants will learn how to construct predictive models and assess habitat suitability for species.
